item.title: Israeli strike targets senior Hamas leadership in Qatar
item.description: A Hamas official says the group's negotiating team was targeted during a meeting in Doha.

item.title: Russian air strike kills 24 in pension queue, Ukraine says
item.description: The attack targeted the eastern village of Yarova, officials say, a few kilometres from the front line.

item.title: Macron under pressure to name new PM as France simmers ahead of protests
item.description: Fran√ßois Bayrou has handed in his resignation, leaving France without a prime minister on the eve of nationwide protests.

item.title: Nepal anti-corruption protests explained
item.description: Protests in Nepal turned violent after thousands of youngsters marched against the blocking of social media platforms.

item.title: White House denies Trump's alleged birthday message to Epstein is authentic
item.description: The message purportedly written by Trump is inside a 238-page book released by a House committee.
